allow:
Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
$scriptPath = ''D:\\GitHub-Trending-Notion''
$pythonScript = $scriptPath + ''\\github_trending_notion.py''
$taskName = ''GitHubTrendingToNotion''

$task = Get-ScheduledTask -TaskName $taskName -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
if \($task\) {
  Unregister-ScheduledTask -TaskName $taskName -Confirm:$false
  Write-Host ''Old task removed''
}

$action = New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute ''python'' -Argument $pythonScript -WorkingDirectory $scriptPath
$trigger = New-ScheduledTaskTrigger -Daily -At 09:00
$settings = New-ScheduledTaskSettingsSet -AllowStartIfOnBatteries -DontStopIfGoingOnBatteries

Register-ScheduledTask -TaskName $taskName -Action $action -Trigger $trigger -Settings $settings

Write-Host ''=== Task Created ===''
Write-Host ''Name: GitHubTrendingToNotion''
Write-Host ''Schedule: Daily at 09:00''
Get-ScheduledTask -TaskName $taskName
")
